title: Spiced Courgette on Toast
description: A luxurious breakfast, or light dinner - courgette on toast (and all of it’s wonderful variations) is a dish that I often make. It’s quick, cheap, and very healthy. I recommend eating this with a soft boiled egg (cooked for 6 minutes in boiling water), alternatively, a few slices of fried paneer would also be an excellent addition.
method: Heat a medium frying pan with 1-2 tbsp of olive oil over a medium heat. When the pan is hot, add the onion chopped onion until sweet and soft, about 8-10 minutes. Stir occasionally to prevent the onions catching.
Add the chopped garlic, coriander stalks, chilli, and ginger plus 1 tbsp of cumin. Fry for a further two minutes until the cumin is fragrant and garlic is golden.
Stir in the grated courgette and cook, stirring frequently, for about 5 minutes.
Taste for salt, then place on top liberally buttered toast, scatter over the coriander leaves and eat immediately.
